amendment.description: To increase the amount available for port security grants by $300,000,000.

action.text: Amendment SA 3596 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3596 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 49. Record Vote Number: 171.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3596.
Amendment SA 3596 proposed by Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S9003-9006; text: CR S9003) To increase the amount available for port security grants by $300,000,000.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3596 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 49. Record Vote Number: 171.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3596 proposed by Senator Murray.
